title: A Dead Man's Odyssey
description: This is a story about a man who is killed in a freak accident and upon his death he finds himself not in Heaven or Hell, but in a place that he didn't; while alive, believe existed. He found himself in Purgatory, the cleansing place and it is nothing like it was described in scripture.He is told why he is here and what he must do in order to escape so that he may be allowed to continue his journey on to the Holy City.While he is here he meets and interacts with many others who have met the same fate and is confronted by an adversary who is bound and determined to keep him in this place between Heaven and Hell. Whether or not he escapes or spends an eternity in this place filled with anxiety and desperation is revealed in a surprise ending
author: George T. Horvat
